alert.note: Alert for Mountrail; Ward (North Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued August 23 at 3:50PM CDT until August 23 at 4:45PM CDT by NWS Bismarck
info.description: The National Weather Service in Bismarck has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southwest Ward County in north central North Dakota... Southeastern Mountrail County in northwestern North Dakota... * Until 445 PM CDT. * At 349 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Plaza, or 27 miles southeast of Stanley, moving southeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...Quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Damage to vehicles is expected. * This severe thunderstorm will be near... Plaza around 355 PM CDT. Makoti around 410 PM CDT. Ryder around 425 PM CDT. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...<50 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
